titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain flavored green tea in immediate packings of a content not exceeding 3 kilograms.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain flavored green tea in immediate packings of a content not exceeding 3 kilograms.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on certain flavored green tea in immediate packings of a content not exceeding 3 kilograms.
